data.actual_result: The transparent background is rendered black
data.expected_result: The image thumbnail/preview renders with the transparent background
data.short_description: The transparent background of PNG images renders black in the Attach file image preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have at least one PNG image with transparent background in your phone/tablet storage - Go to any channel you can type in - Click the plus sign to add a file - Scroll through the image file picker to find the PNG image
